mc.oracleText: Attacking creatures get +2/+0 until end of turn.

mc.name: Twincast
mc.oracleText: Copy target instant or sorcery spell. You may choose new targets for the copy.

mc.name: Undead Slayer
mc.oracleText: {W}, {T}: Exile target Skeleton, Vampire, or Zombie.

mc.name: Underworld Dreams
mc.oracleText: Whenever an opponent draws a card, Underworld Dreams deals 1 damage to him or her.

mc.name: Unholy Strength
mc.oracleText:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +2/+1.

mc.name: Unsummon
mc.oracleText: Return target creature to its owner's hand.

mc.name: Vampire Aristocrat
mc.oracleText: Sacrifice a creature: Vampire Aristocrat gets +2/+2 until end of turn.

mc.name: Vampire Nocturnus
mc.oracleText:
Play with the top card of your library revealed.
As long as the top card of your library is black, Vampire Nocturnus and other Vampire creatures you control get +2/+1 and have flying.

mc.name: Veteran Armorsmith
mc.oracleText: Other Soldier creatures you control get +0/+1.

mc.name: Veteran Swordsmith
mc.oracleText: Other Soldier creatures you control get +1/+0.

mc.name: Viashino Spearhunter
mc.oracleText: First strike (This creature deals combat damage before creatures without first strike.)

mc.name: Wall of Bone
mc.oracleText:
Defender (This creature can't attack.)
{B}: Regenerate Wall of Bone. (The next time this creature would be destroyed this turn, it isn't. Instead tap it, remove all damage from it, and remove it from combat.)

mc.name: Wall of Faith
mc.oracleText:
Defender (This creature can't attack.)
{W}: Wall of Faith gets +0/+1 until end of turn.

mc.name: Wall of Fire
mc.oracleText:
Defender (This creature can't attack.)
{R}: Wall of Fire gets +1/+0 until end of turn.

mc.name: Wall of Frost
mc.oracleText:
Defender (This creature can't attack.)
Whenever Wall of Frost blocks a creature, that creature doesn't untap during its controller's next untap step.

mc.name: Warp World
mc.oracleText: Each player shuffles all permanents he or she owns into his or her library, then reveals that many cards from the top of his or her library. Each player puts all artifact, creature, and land cards revealed this way onto the battlefield, then does the same for enchantment cards, then puts all cards revealed this way that weren't put onto the battlefield on the bottom of his or her library.

mc.name: Weakness
mc.oracleText:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets -2/-1.

mc.name: Whispersilk Cloak
mc.oracleText:
Equipped creature is unblockable.
Equipped creature has shroud. (It can't be the target of spells or abilities.)
Equip {2} ({2}: Attach to target creature you control. Equip only as a sorcery.)

mc.name: White Knight
mc.oracleText:
First strike (This creature deals combat damage before creatures without first strike.)
Protection from black (This creature can't be blocked, targeted, dealt damage, or enchanted by anything black.)

mc.name: Wind Drake
mc.oracleText: Flying

mc.name: Windstorm
mc.oracleText: Windstorm deals X damage to each creature with flying.

mc.name: Wurm's Tooth
mc.oracleText: Whenever a player casts a green spell, you may gain 1 life.

mc.name: Xathrid Demon
mc.oracleText:
Flying, trample
At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice a creature other than Xathrid Demon, then each opponent loses life equal to the sacrificed creature's power. If you can't sacrifice a creature, tap Xathrid Demon and you lose 7 life.

mc.name: Yawning Fissure
mc.oracleText: Each opponent sacrifices a land.

mc.name: Zephyr Sprite
mc.oracleText: Flying
